author: Joel Achenbach, Joel Achenbach
title: Coronavirus vaccine: Slow mutation suggests jab could offer 'immunity for a long time', says scientist
description: 'The mutation rate of the virus would suggest that the vaccine developed for Sars-CoV-2 would be a single vaccine, rather than a new vaccine every year like the flu vaccine,' molecular geneticist says
content: The coronavirus is not mutating significantly as it circulates through the human population, according to scientists who are closely studying the novel pathogen's genetic code. That relative stability suggests the virus is less likely to become more or less d… [+3897 chars]
